Package xxl.core.pipes.memoryManager.heartbeat

Interface Summary
Heartbeat The implementation of this interfaces allows to use heartbeats for memory management.
HeartbeatPipe To avoid overhead, operators may decide not to deliver a heartbeat.
 

Class Summary
HBQueryExecutor  
HeartbeatGenerator  
HeartbeatGenerator.HBEntry  
Heartbeats Contains some static methods for heartbeats.
Heartbeats.SkewBoundEntry A class for storing skew bound entries.
 

Enum Summary
Heartbeat.HBType  
 

Exception Summary
HeartbeatException This exception is thrown to indicate that results might be lost due to a heartbeat.
